name: Pangan
description:
Food (Pangan), this work is one of basic human needs in Javaness Philosophy - Clothing, Food, Shelter (Sandang, Pangan, Papan) - work series

Clothing (Sandang). It is in the first order of the philosophy of the necessities of life and has been instilled since childhood. Clothing, food and shelter (Sandang, Pangan, Papan). In Javanese culture, the literal meang of Sandang is outfit, and metaphorically, self-determination in front of others is a virtue. With good outift and self-worth, the need for food and housing will be well met as well. So I wonder, how deep can this philosophy of life be used today? What if the order and priorities were reversed: food, shelter, clothing (Pangan, Papan, Sandang)?

Kind:Graphics Interchange Format (GIF)
Dimension:2283 × 3228
Year:2021
